page.title: 02Living in Grantown
page.content: Grantown is a pleasant place for all ages. Tourists come here throughout the year to enjoy the scenery of{Speyside.}Even though Grantown is quiet, there is a lot to do. In the{pine woods}nearby where we have{deer}and other{wildlife,}we can go for{nature walks.}Both old and young enjoy the quietness of Grantown and the variety of walks, with many places to explore. One of the main attractions in summer is the{fishing {in the River Spey. In winter we can easily reach both the{Cairngorm and Lecht Ski centres. Grantown is a place where people can relax. We can walk the streets at night without the fear of being mugged. {Come to Grantown to escape from the {noise and the grime of the city.
